imageurl.title: Login
imageurl.description: Secure login screen for insurance department staff to access the INSURE system using authorized credentials, ensuring data privacy and compliance.

imageurl.title: Dashboard
imageurl.description: Centralized dashboard providing an overview of insurance claims, patient status, pending approvals, processed cases, and key operational metrics.

imageurl.title: Insurance Claim Reports
imageurl.description: Module for creating, viewing, and managing patient insurance claim reports, including treatment details, billing information, and claim status.

imageurl.title: Advanced Patient Search
imageurl.description: Advanced search functionality to quickly find patient insurance records using criteria such as patient ID, policy number, admission date, or insurer.

imageurl.title: Menu
imageurl.description: Navigation menu providing quick access to insurance claim modules, patient records, reports, approvals, and system settings.

imageurl.title: Credit Allocation
imageurl.description: Feature for managing and allocating approved insurance credits or claim amounts to patient accounts based on insurer approval.

imageurl.title: Allocated by User Report
imageurl.description: Report showing insurance claim allocations handled by individual users, helping track workload, accountability, and processing efficiency.

imageurl.title: Consolidated Report
imageurl.description: Comprehensive consolidated report summarizing insurance claims across patients, insurers, and departments for analysis and audits.

imageurl.title: Consolidated Report Criteria
imageurl.description: Filter and criteria selection screen for generating customized consolidated insurance reports based on date range, insurer, status, or department.

description: INSURE is a hospital insurance management application designed to streamline patient insurance claim processing. The system enables insurance department staff to manage patient records, submit and track claims, allocate approved credits, and generate detailed reports. With secure access, advanced search, and comprehensive reporting, INSURE improves claim accuracy, operational efficiency, and transparency in hospital insurance workflows.
